Echo Yin

Ontario, Canada · eyinoverthinking@gmail.com

As someone who truly enjoys gaming and has a keen interest in game development, I've had the opportunity to explore different tech stacks and even pursued a Master's degree in Computer Science at Lakehead University.

Through my involvement in game development and journalism, I've gained valuable insights into the industry, which have helped me develop a genuine appreciation for the complexities of game design and development.

With my diverse experience in various tech stacks and my ability to effectively communicate and collaborate, I believe I have the potential to embark on a fulfilling journey in the field of game development.

  • Added cross-platform functionalities to internal UI framework using C# and Unity;
  • Maintenance and support of existing infrastructure.

    Interests

    When I'm not immersed in lines of code, I find solace in the realm of games. They transport me to worlds of adventure and imagination, where I can explore, strategize, and connect with friends across virtual landscapes. Gaming provides a much-needed escape from the digital world I often find myself in.

    Pets bring an abundance of joy and companionship to my life. Whether it's the excited wag of a dog's tail or the gentle purr of a cat nestled in my lap, their unconditional love reminds me of the simple pleasures that make life truly meaningful.

    Books are my constant companions, offering a sanctuary from the chaos of everyday life. I lose myself in their pages, traveling to far-off places, meeting fascinating characters, and expanding my knowledge. The touch of a physical book and the scent of its pages bring a sense of grounding in an increasingly digital world.

    But it is in the embrace of nature that I find true peace. Whether I'm hiking through serene forests or simply basking in the sunlight, the beauty of the natural world rejuvenates my spirit. I am acutely aware of the urgent need to protect and preserve our environment, and I strive to do my part by living a low-carbon life and reducing waste wherever possible.

    In a world that often values excess and constant consumption, I have found contentment in simplicity. Through my love for games, pets, books, and the outdoors, I have discovered a rich tapestry of experiences that nourish my soul. Guided by my commitment to living sustainably, I hope to inspire others to embrace a minimalist lifestyle and join me in protecting the beauty of our planet.
